mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_product pr inner join tb_category ca on (pr.categoryId=ca.id) inner join tb_column co on (ca.columnId = co.id) where (co.id = #{id} or co.parentId = #{id}) and pr.status is true and pr.publish is true
select count(pr.id) from tb_product pr inner join tb_category ca on (pr.categoryId=ca.id) where (pr.categoryId = #{cateId} or ca.parentId = #{cateId}) and pr.status is true and pr.publish is true
select * from tb_product pr where pr.categoryId = #{cateId} and pr.status is true and pr.publish is true order by pr.priority desc,pr.hot desc,pr.id desc limit #{start},#{pageSize}
